snippet.title: HUNTDOWN® E3 2017 TRAILER
snippet.description:
http://store.steampowered.com/app/598550/Huntdown/

Challenge yourselves in this hard-boiled co-op arcade shooter. Run, jump and take cover in mayhem streets of the future. Kill the henchmen, take the guns and Huntdown their leaders! Collect the bounty, level by level. 
Make a healthy living — by making living unhealthy.

In development by Easy Trigger Games™ 
Published by Coffee Stain Publishing

http://easytrigger.com/huntdown/
https://twitter.com/huntdowngame
https://www.facebook.com/huntdowngame
